name: Miyamoto Musashi
ability: Sharply increases skill DMG and moderately reduces DMG taken.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the master swordsman whose famous duel on Ganryu Island became the stuff of legend. After becoming spirits, Musashi and rival Kojiro faced off once again, but despite Musashi's confidence in his own strength, he lost their rematch to Kojiro's diligent training. Pained by his defeat, Musashi committed himself to a brutal training regimen of his own, allowing him to stand victorious over his rival the following year. Ever since, the pair have dueled once a year, each striving to gain the upper hand against an ever-improving opponent. Needless to say, both Musashi and Kojiro hate to lose.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 19/07/17- 09/08/2017
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 06/08/2017 - 09/08/2017
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the total Event Points gained by 33% during the "The Great Fireworks Showdown" event.
◦ The effect increases with the number of limit breaks. (33% → 49.75% → 66.5% → 83.25% → 100%)
◦ Summon rate increased until 19/07/17- 09/08/2017

main: "I'll show you what some training can do."
summon: "Hoh, looks like you've got some spirit."
